section.name: User is registered on the site

case.title: check that the user can go to the author’s profile by clicking on the author’s nickname
check that the user can go to the author’s profile by clicking on the author’s photo
check that the user by clicking on the tag will go to the article on the topic of the tag
check can user mark favorite posts by clicking the [like] button
check the user clicks on the “Read more” link to go to the full article
check can user mark favorite posts by clicking the [like] button
check the user clicks on the “Read more” link to go to the full article
check that the user can go to the selected page by clicking on the page number
check that the user can go to the page with the selected topic by clicking on a specific tag
check if the user can fill in the''Article Title'' field
check if the user can fill in the'' What"s this Article about'' field
check if the user can fill in the''Write your Article(in markdown)" field
check if the user can fill in the ''Enter tags'' field
check if the user can expose the post click[Publish article] button
check if the user can fill in the "empty value" field
check if the user can fill in the "empty value" field
check if the user can fill in the "empty value" field
check that the minimum value of the signs is 5, if there are fewer signs, there should be an error message.
check the maximum value of characters is 240; if there are more characters, an error message should appear.
check the user can create two or more articles with the same title;
check the Accept letters, numbers, special characters, spaces (can’t be first, last, and few in a row).
check ''Publish Article” button validates all mandatory fields and (if they are all filled) creates an article.
check that If any of the mandatory fields wasn’t filled, an error message appears above each not filled field.
check that if the user leaves the “New message” screen without publishing, all the entered information disappears.
check that after successful publication of the article, the user is redirected to the page of the user's article.
check if there is a required field for the description of the article.
check that the permissible number of characters is from 10-240.
check that letters, numbers, special characters, spaces are allowed (cannot be the first, last and few in a row).
check that Mandatory field, if empty “Body of article can't be blank.” error message appears.
check that the number of characters should be from 20 to 9000
check that the field does not accept any attachments;
check that the user can move the right corner of the text field down to resize it;
check that accept letters, numbers, special characters, spaces (can’t be first, last, and few in a row).
check that User can create tags for his article for future sorting
check that Tag contain 2-30 symbols (only letters and numbers);
check that article can contain 1-10 tags;
check that Each tag starts from “#” symbol
check that Tags not key sensitive
check that only authorized authors with created articles can get on the screen.
check that the “Edit article” button validates the form and saves changes added.
check that users can click on the "Edit Article" button without any changes.
check that If any of the mandatory fields wasn’t filled, error messages appear above each not filled field.
check that “Cancel” button returns the user to the User's Article page without saving the changes.
check that the user can click [Follow user] to view their profile
check that the user can view ''My Articles''
check that the user can view ''Favorites Articles''
check can user mark favorite posts by clicking the [like] button
check that Page available only for logged in author of article.
check that no author sees the page of trivial articles.
check that the user can get to the page: by creating an article; from the “My Articles” tab on the user’s page; from the Global Channel tab (if you are logged in as an author)
check that there is a field with "Title of the article"
check that there is a publication date;
check that there is an “Edit article” button (opens “Edit post” screen by click);
check that there is an ““Delete article” button (delete the article, can’t be undone).
check that the permissible number of characters is from 1-240 characters (letters, numbers, special characters),
check that user can slide-down right corner of text box to change its size.
check that the user avatar is in the lower left corner;
check that the “Leave a Comment” button is in the lower right corner: check the form and, if it is not empty, leave a comment
Verify that the button is '' delete comment'' button at the lower right corner (for author’s of comment only).
check that name and avatar of comment author (redirects to User page by click) at the lower left corner;
check if the user can fill in the ''URL of profile picture''field
check if the user can fill in the ''Username'' field
check if the user can fill in the''Short bio about you'' field
check if the user can fill in the ''Email'' field
check if the user can update the data by clicking on the[Update Settings] button
check if the user can go to the main page by clicking on the [Or click here to log out]button
check if the user can fill in the ''Username'' field
check if the user can fill in the "empty value" field
check if the user can fill in the ''Email'' field
check if the user can fill in the "empty value" field
check if the user can fill in the''Password'' field
check if the user can fill in the "empty value" field
check whether the user can register click [Seting In] button
A user cannot be successfully registered if the format of the email does not match the form: [name] @ [domain]. [Top domain]
A user can be successfully registered if the email format matches the form: [name] @ [domain]. [Top domain]
User can be successfully registered if Email Unique
User cannot be successfully registered if Email is not unique
user can be successfully registered if Email contains [name] integer / Latin / symbols (. _ +) characters
user is not can be successfully registered if its password is less than 4 characters
user is not can be successfully registered if his password is more than 30 characters
user is not can be successfully registered if its password does not contain: at least one character, one integer, capital letter
user is not can be successfully registered if its password does not contain: only characters,
user is not can be successfully registered if its password does not contain: only number
check if the password field is covered with a mask (****)
check if the user can not fill in the "username" field
User cannot be successfully registered when entering a 2-character username
A user cannot be successfully registered when entering a username of 37 or more characters
User cannot be successfully registered when entering user name from numbers and special characters
The user cannot be successfully registered when entering a non-unique username
The user cannot be successfully registered when entering a unique username with a length of less than 4
A user cannot be successfully registered when entering a unique username longer than 36
check if the user can follow the link
check if the user can fill in the ''Email'' field
check if the user can fill in the "empty value" field
check if the user can fill in the''Password'' field
check if the user can fill in the "empty value" field
check if the user can enter his profile by clicking [Sign In ] button
the user cannot log in if the password field is not filled
Username/Password pair should be the same as on the server.
Possibility to paste a password text in the “password“ field
Password mask (********)
Check: the entered email must be present in the server database.
the user cannot log in if the email field is not filled
email field can be replaced with username
Email field must be validated
